Coming from a farmer in Dam Doi district,

how to increase the value of crabs,
not only stopping at research, but

certain successes with
his system.  Mr. Bac is designed with a
BN stocking cycle of over 40 days and
harvests four times per crop. He uses a
circulating filter system that uses bactericidal lamps,
with this method there is almost no need to
change water and utilize  If you have a

will be 4 to 5 times higher than the crabs you

raise the crabs until they reach a diagnosis.  But if I reach

well. In general, the teacher is very dedicated. He

October 25, causing two
of them to be
hospitalized. Viet example occurred on the morning of October 25
when the team  This worker was
cleaning the pipes at the liquid handling system.
According to the report, during the
work, the drainage pipe suddenly burst,
causing about 100 ml of toxic liquid
to spill out and splash into five workers.  It was
known that at that time, five people were
wearing masks and protective clothing to prevent
swallowing the liquid. However,
the liquid had come into contact with the skin of four
people even though they were washed off immediately,
but the amount of radioactivity on their skin was unknown.  of two
people in the group still did not drop to a
safe level. So they were taken to
the hospital immediately after and will have to be
monitored. For about two weeks tepco said the
two workers hospitalized were not wearing
raincoats over their clothes.
